attributes.action: Protect UK Christian Religious beliefs and celebrations.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Keep the UK a Christian country, respect other religions but not at the cost of our own beliefs.  If you live in the UK you must show respect to our christian religion, customs and celebrations. These must remain a fundamental part and right of our culture.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
